emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom Royal Finch Jr., and bride Frances Mosby Finch posed arm in arm, in front of altar in St. Richards Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. A11, reads: "District Couples Married - Wedding bells rang for the above district couples last Saturday... The second picture shows A2/c Royal Finch Jr. and his bride, the former Frances Mosby.  They were united at St. Richards Church, Pittsburgh.  The new Mrs. Richards is the daughter of Chief Warrant Officer Kenny Mosby and Mrs. Jean Mosby Slater.  The groom is stationed at an Air Force base in South Carolina."
